Welcome to Feed2Fedi's documentation!
=====================================

Feed2Fedi is a bot that reads items from one or more RSS/Atom feeds and posts each feed item to a `Fediverse`_ server.
Feed2Fedi supports servers running Mastodon, Takahe, and Pleroma.
Feed2Fedi has been inspired by `feed2toot`_.

Setting up Feed2Fedi
--------------------

For instructions on how to set-up Feed2Fedi for the first time read :doc:`Setting-up-Feed2Fedi`

Specifics
---------

There is more information on :doc:`Config-File-Explained`

Other info
----------

For information on how to help improve tootbot read :doc:`Improving-Feed2Fedi`
